import Link from 'next/link' import renderHTML from 'react-render-html' import moment from 'moment' import {API} from '../../config' const RelatedJournal = ({journal}) => { //navigating between dynamic pages return (

{`${journal.title}`}

Created At: {moment(journal.updatedAt).fromNow()}

{renderHTML(journal.democontent)}
Read more
) } export default RelatedJournal
